title: About your dataset - Part 2
description: Please provide some general information about your dataset below.

homepage.title: Home page
homepage.description: Add the URL to the homepage of this dataset.

supportChannel.title: Support channel
supportChannel.description: Enter all channels through which a user can receive support for handling this research product.

howToCite.title: How to cite
howToCite.description: Enter the preferred citation for this dataset version.

inputData.title: Input data
inputData.description: Add the data that was used as input for this dataset version. This is typically a DOI or reference to the original dataset from which the current dataset is derived (if applicable).

relatedPublication.description: Please list DOIs of all related publications that report on the dataset itself or on analysis based on the data.

previewImage.title: Dataset preview image
previewImage.description: Upload a preview image for this dataset version.
previewImage.text: Please upload a preview image for your dataset. This image will be displayed on the dataset landing page and should give a general overview of the dataset. The image should be a .jpg or a .png file and preferrably be at least 500x500 pixels in size.
